Polda Sultra Selidiki Kasus 'Desa Hantu', 57 Saksi Diperiksa
07 Nov 2019, 07:43 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani menyinggung adanya 'desa hantu' yang menerima dana desa. Polda Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra) mengatakan sudah melakukan penyelidikan terhadap kasus tersebut dan sudah memeriksa 57 saksi.
"Polda Sultra sejak bulan Januari sudah menerima pelimpahan penyelidikan dari Polres Konawe lalu ditangani Subdit Tipikor Polda Sultra. Polda sudah melakukan langkah lidik lanjutan. Sudah dicek terhadap desa-desa yang ada di Perda 7/2011. Perda ini dikeluarkan Pemkab Konawe. Penyidik sudah memeriksa beberapa dokumen, sudah memeriksa 57 saksi," kata Kabid Humas Polda Sultra AKBP Harry Goldehardt, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam.
Harry menuturkan akan segera memeriksa saksi dari Kemendagri. Pemeriksaan terkait rekomendasi definisi usulan desa tersebut.
"Pemeriksaan saksi dari Kemendagri yang menerima rekomendasi usulan mendefinitifkan desa dengan lampiran perda 7/11. Serta peta desa," ujarnya.
Harry mengatakan masih terus melakukan penyelidikan lanjutan sebelum menentukan tersangka. Pihaknya juga masih menunggu laporan hasil pemriksaan (LHP) dari Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan (BPK).
"Kita menunggu cek fisik ahli konstuksi dan LHP BPK," sebut Harry.

Southeast Sulawesi Regional Police Investigate 'Ghost Village' Case, 57 Witnesses Examined
Nov 7 2019, 07:43 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani alluded to a 'ghost village' that received village funds. The Southeast Sulawesi Regional Police (Sultra) said that they had investigated the case and had examined 57 witnesses.
"The South Sulawesi Regional Police since January has received a delegation of investigations from the Konawe Regional Police and then has been handled by the South Sulawesi Regional Corruption Criminal Investigation Sub-dept. The Regional Police have conducted further investigation. It has been checked against villages in Perda 7/2011. This Perda was issued by the Konawe District Government. some documents, have examined 57 witnesses, "said Head of North Sumatra Regional Police Public Relations, Harry Goldehardt, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night.
Harry said that he would immediately examine witnesses from the Ministry of Home Affairs. Examination related to the recommended definition of the village proposal.
"The examination of witnesses from the Ministry of Home Affairs who received the recommendation proposals defining the village with an attachment to the 7/11 perda. As well as the village map," he said.
Harry said that he was still conducting further investigations before determining the suspect. It is also still waiting for the results of the inspection report (LHP) from the Supreme Audit Agency (BPK).
"We are waiting for a physical check from the construction expert and the BPK LHP," said Harry.
